departments to accurately and timely obtain required content, improving enterprise operational efficiency 02 Automated checking of content completeness, synchronizing materials, achieving rapid Content: Content+AI  Drives Brands’ Growth 2025特赞科技  / Tezign Inc.ÇÇÇLow Production EfﬁciencyHigh Error Rate in ProductionInefﬁcient Material  CollectionCumbersome Matching  ProcessDelayed Updates  and ErrorsPoor Material  CompletenessInefﬁcient Manual  HandlingKey Roles

Content: Content+AI  Drives Brands’ Growth 2025特赞科技  / Tezign Inc.
Content: Automated Asset Completeness Checks and DeploymentWorld-Renowned Sports BrandThe brand operates over 20 owned and third-party stores, requiring more than 10,000 new assets daily. E-commerce deployment involves extensive material transfers, leading to time consumption and frequent asset loss. The e-commerce team faces challenges in frequent communication when uploading model product images, increasing process complexity and communication costs, necessitating optimization of overall deployment efﬁciency.Solutions and Results 1.SKU Auto-Tagging: Integration with PIM (Product Information Management) for ﬁle name recognition and auto-tagging, improving efﬁciency and completeness. 2.Automated E-commerce Backend Push: Automatically bulk upload materials and push them to designated e-commerce channels and locations. 3.Model Information Intelligent Binding: Centralized management of model data via DAM system, with automatic tagging during upload, simplifying product detail page editing.11Person-Days/Month  Saved in Labor Costs100% Content CompletenessFOLLOW & DMAIBI FOR THE FULL VERSION
Content: Content+AI  Drives Brands’ Growth 2025特赞科技  / Tezign Inc.Global Leading Sportswear BrandWith over 20 million assets, the brand faced challenges in rapid operations during campaigns due to traditional system architecture. Its large-scale business spans diverse channels, including ofﬁcial websites, mini-programs, apps, e-commerce platforms, and numerous distributor channels. Frequent new product launches and high SKU counts led to signiﬁcant and frequent content demands across channels, posing management and operational challenges.Solutions and Results 1.DAM Cold and Hot Storage Management: Cold storage for low-reuse assets, hot storage for campaign assets, improving performance and efﬁciency. 2.Tag-Based Content Management: Tagging assets with product codes for quick ﬁltering and deployment by e-commerce teams. 3.Brand Security Assurance: Centralized management of model/KOL/celebrity information with detailed tags, ensuring secure usage.189% Increase in Content Retrieval Efﬁciency230% increase in Content  Deployment Efﬁciency
Content: FOLLOW & DMAIBI FOR THE FULL VERSION

Content: Content+AI  Drives Brands’ Growth 2025特赞科技  / Tezign Inc.Global Sportswear BrandThe brand aimed to empower sales staff to efﬁciently access and deliver content to in-store customers, showcasing products and outﬁts in real-time to enhance customer experience and boost conversions.Solutions and Results 1.Centralized Brand Content Management for Enhanced Streamlined Workﬂows:  Streamlined content ﬂow from headquarters to stores, enabling quick updates and efﬁcient retrieval. 2.DAM Integration with In-Store Devices for Efﬁcient Supply: Integration of in-store iPad devices with Tezign's DAM system, allowing sales staff to instantly display shoe and clothing combinations to customers, driving sales and ensuring efﬁcient content delivery.120+ Stores Efﬁciently  Managed6800+ Active Content Pieces per Store Monthly
Content: High-Quality Content Aggregation and Uniﬁed SupplyFOLLOW & DMAIBI FOR THE FULL VERSION
Content: Content+AI  Drives Brands’ Growth 2025特赞科技  / Tezign Inc.
Content: Well-known fashion brandThe brand aims to leverage the power of excellent store staff to shoot high-quality images of shoes and post them on Rednote. This ensures that more shoe images and texts remain at the top of search rankings when consumers search for shoe-related keywords, ultimately encouraging consumers to visit ofﬂine stores with the images to make purchases.Solutions and Results 1.Aggregated Management:  Uniﬁed account & content management for clear oversight of staff activities. 2.Task Distribution:  Rapid distribution of campaign content, easy for staff to operate. 3.Creation Tools:  AI-assisted creation to help staff produce better content. 4.Security Assurance:  Intelligent content review before posting to ensure brand compliance & consistency. 145% increase in staff distribution efﬁciency200%  increase in  store visit rateKOS Matrix: Boosts store conversion ratesFOLLOW & DMAIBI FOR THE FULL VERSION

Content: Content+AI  Drives Brands’ Growth 2025特赞科技  / Tezign Inc.
Content: International FMCG BrandSocial media platforms require extensive touchpoint coverage and diverse content for marketing campaigns, yet manual adaptation of a single asset across multiple channels is time-consuming and costly.  While ad platforms demand varied content inputs, their duplicate content detection algorithms restrict the use of homogenized materials. Traditional tools fail to balance brand compliance with anti-duplication requirements, resulting in poor performance of batch-produced content.Solutions and Results 1.Batch Templated Production Pre-conﬁgured multi-platform templates (e.g., feed ads/splash ads) enable one-click generation of horizontal/vertical/multilingual assets via parametric tools, automatically synchronizing brand visual guidelines. 2.AI-Powered Visual Generation AI creates visuals and copy based on text prompts or scenario keywords, ensuring brand-compliant and efﬁcient content creation.200yuan+ saved per material300% increase in extension efﬁciencyBatch templating and  AI-generated scene/long imagesFOLLOW & DMAIBI FOR THE FULL VERSION
Content: Content+AI  Drives Brands’ Growth 2025特赞科技  / Tezign Inc.
Content: Renowned National Electric Vehicle BrandThe brand has numerous downstream dealer stores and is exploring brand operations on TikTok Local Life. With rapid product iterations—monthly updates to exterior designs while maintaining structural design—sales require frequently updated customer engagement materials.Solutions and Results 1.Establish a Group Content Platform to Boost Dealer Social Media Presence: Centralize group content management for efﬁcient supply, enhancing search and collaboration efﬁciency, enabling dealers to quickly access content. 2.Utilize AI Content Production Tools for Bulk Content Creation: Headquarters produce materials based on dealer information, such as posters with store addresses and differentiated promotional policies, region-speciﬁc performance slogans, and videos highlighting various selling points.50+ new content pieces produced daily50w+ new daily trafﬁcVideo content factory for bulk production and distribution FOLLOW & DMAIBI FOR THE FULL VERSION
Content: Content+AI  Drives Brands’ Growth 2025特赞科技  / Tezign Inc.Internationally Renowned Sports BrandMany KOL/KOC videos on social media did not align with brand marketing needs. Despite high quality, these collaborations consumed large budgets, lacked performance tracking, and were hard to reuse. Media and private domains aim to repurpose them for other channels. Solutions and Results 1.Content Storage and Reuse: DAM centrally manages KOL/KOC watermark-free content and performance data for future use/reuse. 2.Convenient Collection and Visual Presentation: Collect KOL/KOC collaboration content and performance data via social links, displayed on a visual dashboard. 3.AI Smart Detection: Use AI to detect if KOL/KOC content mentions brand-required selling points and formats.100% content compliance63% reduction in content reuse costs
Content: FOLLOW & DMAIBI FOR THE FULL VERSION

Content: Content+AI  Drives Brands’ Growth 2025特赞科技  / Tezign Inc.
Content: International FMCG BrandPreviously relying on spreadsheets for KOL/KOC data, the process was time-consuming and cumbersome, causing delayed updates and impacting decision-making timeliness. Additionally, the lack of efﬁcient content monitoring visualization tools hindered further improvements in advertising content.Solutions and Results 1.AI Ad Review: KOL/KOC content is checked upon upload to DAM and is only released for distribution after approval. 2.Visual Data Dashboard: Provides an intuitive data display, helping to monitor content effectiveness        in real-time and adjust strategies for optimal marketing results.130% Ad ROI100% KOL/KOC ComplianceData Effectiveness  Feedback is MonitorableFOLLOW & DMAIBI FOR THE FULL VERSION

Content: Content+AI  Drives Brands’ Growth 2025特赞科技  / Tezign Inc.Global Industrial Manufacturing BrandThe group lacks effective methods to boost dealer capabilities. Current SCRM tools focus on promotions, lacking quality content, limiting sales-consumer interactions and brand appeal. This hampers reaching target customers and building long-term loyalty.Solutions and Results 1.DAM Content Hub for Centralized Management: High-quality operational content is managed through the content hub, and premium content purchased by the marketing department is also imported to enrich operational content. 2.AI-Powered Efﬁcient Search and Retrieval: Channel sales can quickly access suitable content via SCRM tools and directly send it to customers.140% Content Circulation Efﬁciency150+ Managed SKUs
Content: Uniﬁed Management Efﬁcient DistributionFOLLOW & DMAIBI FOR THE FULL VERSION
Content: Content+AI  Drives Brands’ Growth 2025特赞科技  / Tezign Inc.
Content: International Luxury BrandWith over 400 sales associates across numerous ofﬂine stores, the brand faces low usage of enterprise WeChat and lacks uniﬁed private  domain operations. Traditional methods like phone and SMS notiﬁcations are inefﬁcient for modern marketing needs.Solutions and Results 1.Private Domain Content Plan: Uniﬁed account and content management for clear oversight of sales associates. 2.Private Domain Content Distribution:  Facilitate communication with potential customers to expand reach. 3.Data Feedback Dashboard: Monitor customer engagement and optimize content based on user behavior insights.300% increase in  distribution efﬁciency170%+ increase in sales  associate engagementPrivate domain task system  with trackable dataFOLLOW & DMAIBI FOR THE FULL VERSION
Content: Content+AI  Drives Brands’ Growth 2025特赞科技  / Tezign Inc.
Content: Leading B2B BrandIn daily operations, the brand needs to provide dealers/sales with ofﬁcial, accurate, and approved materials such as brand assets, product information, service introductions, and customer case studies. Timely updates and distribution of these materials offer strong support, enabling efﬁcient communication.Solutions and Results 1.Uniﬁed supply of brand-compliant content: Build PC and mobile H5 pages, integrate with CMP Portal (Tezign), and enable end-to-end distribution by the HQ content team to ensure dealers and sales receive the latest approved materials. 2.Flexible 2B product intro pages for personalized engagement: Sales access and distribute marketing materials (images,图⽂ links, mini-program cards, video links) via the content center. Smart poster templates with tracking codes enable data monitoring and analysis.100% channel compliance160% increase in distribution efﬁciencyEfﬁcient personalized  content engagementFOLLOW & DMAIBI FOR THE FULL VERSION
Content: Content+AI  Drives Brands’ Growth 2025特赞科技  / Tezign Inc.
Content: Global Sports BrandThe brand aims to enable sales associates to efﬁciently access content, standardize training, and enhance consumer experience  and conversion.Solutions and Results 1.DAM Integration with Store Devices for One-Click Distribution: Store Pad devices integrated with Tezign DAM allow sales associates to instantly showcase shoe and clothing combinations to consumers, boosting sales and ensuring efﬁcient material supply. 2.Standardized Training Materials to Empower Sales Associates: Smart tagging and uniﬁed content management help accumulate content, creating standardized training materials to improve consumer communication.200w+ brand assets stored120% increase in sales associate engagement efﬁciency标准化培训材料，提⾼服务质量Standardized training materials to enhance service qualityFOLLOW & DMAIBI FOR THE FULL VERSION

Content: Content+AI  Drives Brands’ Growth 2025特赞科技  / Tezign Inc.
Content: A Globally Leading 3C Electronics BrandThe in-house e-commerce team of 400+ designers spends considerable time on main and promotional images. Campaigns require manual updates to gifts, copy, and pricing for all SKUs using PS. Global markets demand localized content due to varying cultures and consumer traits, making traditional methods costly and inefﬁcient. Solutions and Results 1.Efﬁcient Content Access and Flow:  DAM signiﬁcantly enhances new material acquisition across regions, streamlining production and distribution to boost efﬁciency. 2.Streamlined Primary Creation:  Helps brands organize the primary content process, from regional circulation to localized secondary creation. 3.AI-Enhanced Secondary Creation:  Offers intelligent tools for secondary content creation, including localized translation for smaller regions, improving efﬁciency.158% Secondary Creation  Efﬁciency240% Deployment EfﬁciencyBatch template generation for posters with detailed modiﬁcationsSecondary creation tailored to regional characteristics,  enhancing efﬁciencyDAM centralized management for ﬂexible access by global distributorsFOLLOW & DMAIBI FOR THE FULL VERSION
